resp = client.index(
    index="my-index-000001",
    id="1",
    refresh=True,
    document={
        "product": "chocolate",
        "price": [
            20,
            4
        ]
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.search(
    query={
        "term": {
            "product": "chocolate"
        }
    },
    sort=[
        {
            "price": {
                "order": "asc",
                "mode": "avg"
            }
        }
    ],
)
print(resp1)
